sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import {Button} from "../ButtonElements"; /*if didnt work import it from react-scroll min 1:46*/ // import {Button} from "react-scroll"; import { InfoContainer, InfoWrapper, InfoRow, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, BtnWrap, ImgWrap, Img } from './infoElements' const InfoSection = ({ lightBg, id, imgStart, topLine, lightText, headLine, darkText, description, buttonLabel, alt, primary, dark, dark2 }) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headLine} {description} ) } export default InfoSection
